replies.body:
Whos better BajanCanadian or JeromeASF? Who am I kidding they are both better than u!!!111

n0butreally. Do you plan on coming back?
replies.body_tagged:
Whos better BajanCanadian or JeromeASF? Who am I kidding they are both better than u!!!111

n0butreally. Do you plan on coming back?

replies.body:
BajanCanadian was in my recommended channels list for less than a week, lol.

All PotPvP servers are kind of turning toxic with the amount of hackers on them. I'm banned off Kohi b/c my neighbors hacked on my account, so rip. Para = hacker every fight, same with Basic, so I'll def be playing more. 

I still see people using autoclickers and triggerbot to pvp on Avi every day, smh.  
From all the illegitimate players I've faced, I've learned how to detect triggerbot and autoclicker pretty well, though I might not straight out accuse anyone, but I do know.

replies.body:
Mouse: Razer Deathadder 

Keyboard: Corsair Vangeance K60 (Cherry Red)

Headset: Razer Kraken Pro 

Krakens have a lot of base and aren't great for listening to music, but you get used to it fast, and it's a really comfortable headset. Corsair keyboard is very compact and I don't have a lot of room, while still performing great. I transport my keyboard regularly, so I can confirm it's durable. Deathadder is great, great clicking and good durability, with warranty. 

rip 8-blocks, I have 10-blocks now xdddd

replies.body: Ikr, heres my opinion on the DeathAdder. Personally, the rivalry between the Logitech G502 and the DeathAdder is easy to sum up. The DeathAdder has nothing wrong, yet the Logitech is a lot better in a lot of ways, but also has flaws. For instance, they made a system where you can add weights, but the mouse is already 30 g heavier. The scroll wheel is so stiff, that when you wanna click it you scroll. the extra buttons feel a but mushy, but that isnt that much of a big deal. The DeathAdder is perfect in being simple, which makes it perfect for FPS games. Its light, has 2 extra buttons, has an ok sensor, pretty high DPI, and a perfect scroll wheel. The thing is, you always want a little but more with the DeathAdder, which makes you have doubts. But I cant live without a light mouse, I need it to have a good scroll wheel too.
replies.body_tagged: Ikr, heres my opinion on the DeathAdder. Personally, the rivalry between the Logitech G502 and the DeathAdder is easy to sum up. The DeathAdder has nothing wrong, yet the Logitech is a lot better in a lot of ways, but also has flaws. For instance, they made a system where you can add weights, but the mouse is already 30 g heavier. The scroll wheel is so stiff, that when you wanna click it you scroll. the extra buttons feel a but mushy, but that isnt that much of a big deal. The DeathAdder is perfect in being simple, which makes it perfect for FPS games. Its light, has 2 extra buttons, has an ok sensor, pretty high DPI, and a perfect scroll wheel. The thing is, you always want a little but more with the DeathAdder, which makes you have doubts. But I cant live without a light mouse, I need it to have a good scroll wheel too.
